channel.title: Knob for i radio 8 v object
channel.description:
Hello Community, this week i had received my axoloti with axocontrol. i am running through factory examples and i find many similarities with Nord Modular editor - that makes it a bit easier. I think I can see go beypond nord limitations, but that will be far future.
I would like to ask such question:
in superb example "Amon is broke" there is an object "ctrl / i radio 8 v" which can select variantions with mouse click. How I could modify/replace this object to select one of those 8 variations with knob - which knob later I could patch into axocontrol object or map to external midi controller?
Thank you.

item.title: Knob for i radio 8 v object
item.dc:creator: @janvantomme Jan Vantomme
item.description:
@janvantomme wrote:

Use a ctrl/dial p and divide its value with math/div 8 to get the same range as the ctrl/i radio v object.

Read full topic
item.source: Knob for i radio 8 v object
